replies.body:
{tag=50a34639abb34cf1b182204756c49f49} Opinions: You're a nice guy, I don't know why some ppl say you're toxic and annoying. You've never been like that around me at least. You're pretty good at pvp and its kinda sad you got banned. Hopefully you get unbanned soon.

{tag=34c05ac3927b448a969958fe7839b876} Opinions if you still k me: I don't know that much about you.You were nice the times we talked together too, but idk why you left. You should come back. 

{tag=f0058ee57a354c979cc9f97c5a576697} FIrstly, SUB OUT:Sigh. I've heard that line too many times.
Secondly opinoins: Overall, I think you are a chill guy. You're a great defending and the tips you gave to me with defending really helped. You're nice the times we talk together and you're quite good at pvp (imo. but my opinion on that doesn't really mean much if you know what i mean).

{tag=a88ba5b5e22845929006afd467248a2b}
hi opinion?:Poofay! Hows life in the middle of the ocean lol? You're a nice and chill guy and I like you as a leader in Celestial. Your memes are quite good too. Why do you have so many fanboys tho?
chocolate?: Omg chocolate is my favorite food. I love chocolate so much i can't have enough of it. My fav one is white chocolate.

{tag=48e559bdfea045758db74af50de6c87a}
Best pvp on avicus?:That question is kinda hard to answer. I'm sure that there are many different answers to that but since i haven't really been around in the competetive scene in avicus for a long time back when there were many more teams and players I don't really have the knowledge to answer your question.
Best pvp on celestial?: Cienti or sam the hacker
Pizza or Hamburger?: A nice fatty hamburger please
Sub out: no

{tag=c1d94f186ea3495a8d1b7d9eaf393f64}
Onions: hate em
Opinions: I haven't talked with you much in ts, discord or in game but I think you are good mod. You seem quite chill and nice too.

{tag=075b5514293a4bd5bcef367e687d3556}
Hi: hi
Why do you always get subbed out?: Good question. Wanna answer that {tag=c27e3c929fb64b009ffc16ed9dc5a5e4}?
Opinions: You used to be quite nice, but ever since you joined apollo you are getting more and more toxic sometimes. Not always tho, sometimes you are nice. You're a good mod too.
Favorite pizza toppings? My favorite type of pizza is hawaii so ham and pinapple.
Bye: bye

{tag=7ee8570e63ff4eef9f6c340b857292df}

Opinions: mels ily you're one of my best friends here on avicus. You are the longest friend i've had here that is still playing and its great that you came back!

Favourite country besdies your country: well technically i come from 3 countries (germany, usa and china) but aside from those I really like Canada

Favourite football club in the world: I don't support any club like a pschyo, but i kinda like Borussia Dortmund.

Favourite football club in the Netherlands: The only one i know is Ajax :3

replies.body:
{tag=b9117448b235465cba9e851664aedef0}
Opinions: You're a nice chill guy, and your pvp is very good. Your team is very good too and i used to think you were a beaner lol. Ty for carrying us in scrims xD.

{tag=0bae9bf2c89041509b3bffa60c58e75f}
Opinions: I like your accent and you are a very chill and nice guy in my opinion. Never really chatted with you much apart from that one time in Celestial discord with sam for like 3 hours lol. 
U werer reffing my conquest inc game any opinions on my pvp?: I'm not sure if i remember really watching anyones pvp very closely, but your pvp is definitely better than mine.

{tag=9972d2339492408d9fc5c44de5306550}
Opinions: You are a very nice and funny guy, I wish you could talk more in ts and discord more in scrims and just for fun. I really like you as a leader but you gotta learn to strat like rocky and xtra (sam used to be able to do it, but he's banned). Ask rocky for lessons.
Am I better than Rocky and Poofy?: You're better than both of them and me combined lol. 
Do i have better memes than Mongul?: No. The only memes i see you posting in discord are these weird "Joeys world Tour" memes. They aren't funny. They are sad. Do you even watch that guy???
Favorite Food: Chocolate or Tacos
replies.body_tagged:
ytilauxesomoh
Opinions: You're a nice chill guy, and your pvp is very good. Your team is very good too and i used to think you were a beaner lol. Ty for carrying us in scrims xD.

X911yasuomain69X
Opinions: I like your accent and you are a very chill and nice guy in my opinion. Never really chatted with you much apart from that one time in Celestial discord with sam for like 3 hours lol. 
U werer reffing my conquest inc game any opinions on my pvp?: I'm not sure if i remember really watching anyones pvp very closely, but your pvp is definitely better than mine.

cincip
Opinions: You are a very nice and funny guy, I wish you could talk more in ts and discord more in scrims and just for fun. I really like you as a leader but you gotta learn to strat like rocky and xtra (sam used to be able to do it, but he's banned). Ask rocky for lessons.
Am I better than Rocky and Poofy?: You're better than both of them and me combined lol. 
Do i have better memes than Mongul?: No. The only memes i see you posting in discord are these weird "Joeys world Tour" memes. They aren't funny. They are sad. Do you even watch that guy???
Favorite Food: Chocolate or Tacos

Opinion: You are a hacker :D. Jk. You're very good at pvp, very good. Hopefully you can come to more scrims tho so you can carry. You should also work on your communication on discord, but otherwise I think you're good and also very nice.

replies.body:
{tag=70d2e97acd93474c83d485233621b453}
Opinions: Well I remember when you were just as good as i am, and we trialed for cronus together. For some reason you were accepted quicker, and I never really got to be part of the team for that long. I like you as a person, you are nice but your voice changer is annoying (do you still use that thing? I remember in jala you would always log on with some squeaky animal voice lol). Your pvp is also getting better, and it has been better than mine for a while (which isn't a big achievement).
replies.body_tagged:
ElementalAssasin
Opinions: Well I remember when you were just as good as i am, and we trialed for cronus together. For some reason you were accepted quicker, and I never really got to be part of the team for that long. I like you as a person, you are nice but your voice changer is annoying (do you still use that thing? I remember in jala you would always log on with some squeaky animal voice lol). Your pvp is also getting better, and it has been better than mine for a while (which isn't a big achievement).
